series_description: This series documents the activities and condition of the fund, investment manager returns, and Third Party Administrator statistics.
retention_statement: Retain one copy permanently in VRS. Transfer one copy to the , Library of Virginia. Transfer 20 copies to Documents Section, Library of Virginia (Code of Virginia, ยง2.2-609b).

series_description: This series consists of investment manager and Third Party
retention_statement: Retain in agency 5 years after issuance, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the Immediate Annuity Payout Option chosen by the participant.
retention_statement: Retain for 5 years after life of payout, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of contracts that exist between VRS and Investment Managers, political sub-divisions, Third Party Administrators, consultants, and service providers.
retention_statement: Retain in accordance with terms of contract or 5 years after termination of contract, whichever is greater, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of legal advice from outside VRS counsel and the Office of the Attorney General on VRS decisions.
retention_statement: Retain permanently in agency.

series_description: This series consists of correspondence with graphics designers and printers of Defined Contribution publications and forms.
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively necessary, then destroy.

series_title: Defined Contribution Plan Reference Manual This document is the master copy of the Defined Contribution Plan reference manual for participating employer DCP representatives.
retention_statement: Retain one year after it is superceded, then destroy. At time of publication send 20 copies of each title to State Documents Receiving, Library of Virginia, perCode of Virginia, ยง2.2-609b for inclusion in the depository system. At time of creation send 2 CDs in PDF format of discrete items only produced in electronic format to State Documents Receiving, Library of Virginia.

series_description: This series documents the financial stability, measures of performance, investment returns, and customer services of investment managers. This series includes prospectuses if applicable, investment manager annual reports, correspondence, and meeting notes.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after end of contract with investment manager, then destroy.

series_title: Due Diligence: Third Party Administrator Files
series_description: This series documents the long-term performance of the Third Party Administrator.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after end of contract with the third party administrator, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents notification to the Third Party
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after date of action, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the account balances from the Investment Managers and is used to compare to the Third Party Administrator's reporting.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after receipt, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the monthly and long-term performance of the Investment Managers compared to their respective benchmarks.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after termination of contract with investment manager, then destroy.

series_title: Investment Manager: In-House Performance Review Reports This series is a consolidated report of the investment returns from all of the current investment managers.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after termination of contract with investment manager, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents compliance with the Federal Minimum Distribution requirements.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after final distribution of funds, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page (26 USC Sec. 401(a)9).

series_title: Participant Beneficiary Designation and Enrollment/Distribution Forms
series_description: This series documents participant enrollment and change of beneficiary designation.
retention_statement: Retain for 7 years after final distribution of funds, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the payments to retirees and their deductions
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after disbursement, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the approvals and denials of the release of funds outside normal benefit distribution.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after approval or denial, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents participant investment allocation changes and account statements. This series includes, but is not limited to, those made by telephone and the internet.
retention_statement: Retain for 20 years after transaction, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the participant monetary contribution sent from the employer to the Third Party Administrator.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
Retain permanently in agency.

series_description: This series documents the procurement and selection of Third Party Administrators, Investment Managers, and consultants. The request for proposal and response of the winning vendor become a part of the contract with that vendor. The search questionnaires do not always become a part of the contract.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy.

series_title: Statistical Reports This series is a set of statistical reports on the various defined contribution plans.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years, then destroy.
Retain 5 years, then destroy.
